translations: 罂粟花（poppy 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: "There's a lot of mignonette and poppies," he said.
sentences.translation: “有许多木犀草和罂粟花。”他说。

sentences.sentence: We've been told to sell poppies to airmen in their cookhouse. I don't have the courage: I'm far too shy!
sentences.translation: 我们被告诉，要在他们的户外厨房卖罂粟花给那些空军。我没有勇气：我太害羞了！
